text: Chuignes is a commune. It is in the region Hauts-de-France in the Somme department in the north of France. == History == On August 23, 1918 a German marine canon weighing 600 tonnes, measuring 21 m and with a range of about 40 km was captured by Australian major general John Monash's troops during World War I: the Chuignes Big Bertha.Cyril Rayneau, Le Courrier picard, 22 ao√ªt 2014, p.3. ==References== Category:Communes in Somme
title: Chuignes
